thread.section_title: Firmoo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Firmoo | www.firmoo.com
thread.title: Michelle Tuyet Vo
thread.title_full: Firmoo reviewed by Michelle Tuyet Vo

author: Michelle Tuyet Vo
title: Michelle Tuyet Vo
text: I was a little bummed at first that my glasses had broke just a while after getting them. I've been getting my glasses from firmoo for the past 4 years and was surprised that they snapped. it could have been my fault, but I let them know and they immediately sent me a free replacement! Firmoo is seriously the best, thank you so much for the phenomenal customer service. I'll keep on telling others about you :-)
